Ios7 Orientation Zoom Bug Fix

Need I say more?

This seems to fix the orientation zoom bug on iOS7 without the aid of CSS or Javascript hacks.

<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0" />
